Shadow education secretary Andy Burnham said: This ruling is a victory for all the communities and children betrayed by Michael Gove . "They deserve no less than a full apology from him today and a commitment to act quickly on the court's finding. "The ruling calls into question every school building scheme cut by Michael Gove and is a damning verdict on his competence as a Minister.
